name: 10000 Skeletons
description:
Jump in to a dungeon overflowing with skeletons in this action RPG.

• Fight hordes of bony enemies.
• Loot magical items and deadly weapons.
• Trade the freed souls of the undead for mystical powers.
• Explore and attempt to survive in a dynamic dungeon.
• High Fidelity 2.5D Graphics.

Free to play full game, ad only at start of a new game.

Work in progress, more updates coming soon.

New in v1.3:

  • New graphics and effects.
  • New enemies and items.
  • Traps!
  • New area of dungeon with unique enemies and items.
  • New death screen.
  • Proper multi touch controls.
